si.title: கிளங்கன் வைத்தியசாலை வெளிநோயளர் பிரிவுக்கு வாங்குகதிரைகள் வழங்கி வைப்பு
body_lines: ඩිකෝයා ක්ලන්ගාන් රෝහලේ අත්තන් සිංහ සංගමයේ දී අත්තන් සිංහ සංගමය නික්මිග ඒකකයට සහ සායන සේවා නැරඹීමට පැමිණෙන අයගේ සුභසාධනය සඳහා රේස් එකතුවක් මෙහෙයවීය.

en.title: Purchase Rans to the Klangan Hospital Outpatient Division
body_lines: At the Dikoya Klangan Hospital, the Attan Lions Association gifted a sum of rays to the hospital for the outpatient unit and the welfare of those who visit the clinic services.

Attan Lions Club Chairman S. Sappani, Secretary Nallusamy, Lion Prabhakar, Klangan Hospital Development Association Secretary Sankaramanivannan, Treasurer P. Nagendran and Dr. Arulkumaran were also present.
